abstract.description: Web app leveraging GenAI to automatically generate business fact sheets for French cities, used by commercial teams for client meetings and negotiations.

detail.context: Commercial teams often need city-specific fact sheets for client meetings, but creating them manually is time-consuming and error-prone.
detail.approach: Built a web app that integrates GenAI and data APIs to automatically collect, process, and generate fact sheets from public data sources.
detail.solution_description: The solution allows users to select a city, retrieve relevant data automatically, process it with GenAI, and generate a ready-to-use fact sheet in PDF format.
detail.pros: Fast automation, reduces human error, scalable for multiple cities, leverages cutting-edge AI.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: The web app is a POC; needs improved UI, more robust API error handling, and support for multi-language fact sheets.
